en.title: Console
en.option.limit.title: Limit messages
en.option.limit.info: Just display the last x messages (defined with next option), if disabled than the full log will be loaded (max. 1 MegaByte)
en.option.limitNr.title: Number of messages
en.option.hideUserCommands.title: Collapse rcon user commands
en.option.hideUserCommands.info: If enabled than all logs, that have been generated by any user command in this web interface, will be automatically collapsed
en.option.hideServerLogs.title: Collapse server log messages
en.option.hideServerLogs.info: If enabled than all logs, that are flagged as 'log' (Rust use this alot), will be automatically collapsed
en.input.search: Search in the rcon console log
en.input.cmd: Execute a rcon command, press enter
en.list.commands: List of all commands and variables
